Benson Lee

Brooklyn · New York · (929) 300-4376 · BensonL1334@gmail.com · RESUME · LINKEDIN · GITHUB

I am a software engineer with a philosophy centered on personal growth and staying curious. I think, generally, as people get older we tend to become comfortable with our understanding and complacent with our ignorance; it's an easy pit to fall in that limits our growth and subdues our curiosity. My journey as a software engineer, a position of lifelong learning and autodidacticism, counteracts that complacency by promoting the "Hows" of processes, encouraging the exploration of new ideas, and providing opportunities to grow from mistakes. Additionally, my tech journey serves as an endeavor to stay at the forefront of our changing world, providing opportunities to contribute to the ripples which affect our communities.

Combining software engineering tools with my business background has positioned me as a natural team player with the technical skills to create. And to create fits my idea of true growth, as to create something that is useful, enjoyable, or valuable to others, is to give back to a world we’re used to taking from. I believe the crowning attribute of creation is how insightful the process is; it reveals insights about ourselves, deepening our understanding of our wants, our needs, and even the role we play with regards to those who came before us and those who’ll come after.

Projects

A/S/L

Full Stack App

Styled after AOL, the pioneering social media chat site, this project showcases a group's love for
retro web design. The application has user authentication, authorization, chat, and search capabilities.

Built With

React, Next.js, CSS, Python, Django, Vercel, Heroku

Animestagram

Full Stack App

For anime lovers looking to voice their opinions on their favorite show in a format not unlike
the world's beloved Instagram. Create an account and get your opinions heard!

Built With

React, CSS, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node.js, Express.js, Vercel

The Latest

Front End Website

Big world? Check. Rapidly changing? Check. Information Age? Check. That checklist is a recipe for a fast paced
world built on information; stay in the loop with 'The Latest' scoop. The application is a news aggregate.

Built With

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node.js, Express.js
